WRITING.TITLE: Bully's (Canes Canem Edit's) Gary Smith may be inspired by Scar from Lion King
WRITING.TEXT:
They have their similarities like a scar, backstabbing the ones who kinda trusted them. And most of all, they are both main villians.
I just wanted to see what you think about this theory :)

This is based on the Payday crew from the videogame Payday: The Heist.
From left to the right: Dallas, Hoxton, Chains, Wolf
I made Suomi (Finland), Reich and Sweden. just for fun. Please share it if you found it funny. :)
Christianity is about being a good person. A wise priest told me that I didn't need to believe in God. I just had to hope on God.
Little coast compared to Norway. I also meant coast of German interest. Norway was neutral too but Quisling ruined it with a Coup d' etat.
But Sweden got away during the war only because they have little coast and no Vidkun Quisling
